opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Cockrell, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Institutional Division v. Burdine

opinion:
535 U.S. 1120

COCKRELL, DIRECTOR, TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF CRIMINAL JUSTICE, INSTITUTIONAL DIVISION
v.
BURDINE.

No. 01-495.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 3, 2002.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Motion of respondent for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 262 F. 3d 336.
